tests.test_simrun3 package¶

Submodules¶

tests.test_simrun3.context module¶

tests.test_simrun3.decorators module¶

tests.test_simrun3.decorators.testlevel(flag)[source]¶

decorator for test functions using to define testlevels. This allows to run timeconsuming tests only if necessary.

Recommended usage: testlevel 0: very quick testlevel 1: takes a while testlevel 2: heavy computations

tests.test_simrun3.robust_dask_delayed_execution module¶

class tests.test_simrun3.robust_dask_delayed_execution.RobustDaskDelayedExecution(mdb)[source]¶

Bases: object

This class utilizes the model data base to store delayed objects. It offers methods to run them exactly once. The return value is not saved. Common usecase: Long runing, data generating simulations are aborted (timeout on cluster, some error, …) and you want to complete the remaining tasks.

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.
